name: Rewire Festival

config_properties.name: Rewire Festival
config_properties.description: A forward-thinking music and arts festival in The Hague, Netherlands, known for adventurous programming.

ai_profile:
**Rewire Festival 2026: Where Boundaries Blur and Sounds Converge**

Rewire Festival 2026 brings together a diverse lineup of 45 artists, showcasing a rich tapestry of genres and experimental sounds. With a strong emphasis on pushing creative boundaries, the festival features standout contributions from Experimental (21 artists), Electronic (11 artists), and Ambient (7 artists) genres, while also weaving in unique styles like Avant-garde, Industrial, Folk, and even Primal-Core and Plunderphonics. This year’s lineup highlights the festival’s commitment to blending the familiar with the cutting-edge, offering attendees a dynamic and boundary-pushing auditory experience.

The festival's global reach is evident in its artist representation, spanning 20 countries, including the USA (16 artists), the UK (10 artists), and nations as diverse as Lebanon, Indonesia, Argentina, and India. Rewire 2026 also champions inclusivity, with a near-equal gender representation: 16 female artists, 11 male artists, and contributions from non-binary and mixed-gender groups. Additionally, 17 artists identify as people of color, reflecting the festival’s dedication to amplifying underrepresented voices and perspectives in the music industry.

Audience enthusiasm aligns with the festival’s reputation for quality, as all 45 artists boast an impressive average rating of 8.09, with 91% receiving ratings between 8 and 9. Nearly all performers (95.6%) are accessible via Spotify, allowing attendees to explore their sounds ahead of time. Rewire Festival 2026 continues to stand as a beacon for innovation, diversity, and community, uniting artists and audiences in a celebration of experimental and genre-defying music.
